post.text: Thank you Charlotte, North Carolina! We are going to have an AMAZING victory on November 8th...because this is all about the people! #MAGA

comment.author: Makayla
comment.text: Trump is 150% innocent he needs to come out with one speech saying he is innocent on all the accusations and any more coming out in the future, then he needs to stay in message for the next 28 days and not deture from it, also state that anyone coming forward will be sued for slander, starting making videos on all we wiki leaks and air them non stop in every state.

replies.author: Richard
replies.text: How do you know he's innocent?

replies.text: Because you can tell they are lying, who stays to discuss their mortgage after being assulted, lmao, arm rests in first class do not move lmao, funny with each new wiki leak a new female comes forward lmao
